TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Calasiv, title = Calasiv, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calasiv} }

S.FORM: Calasiv Gaga mniq Pingtung Rayyisyang ka alang Calasiv. 157 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 538 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96 niqan 514 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4 niqan 24 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan89 , Amis1 , Tayal1 , ni rahuq na o3 . Pusu nniqan alang Hangan Calasiv nii o niqan bi pahung na snaw msa. Nniqan alang Nuysan Pintung nsgan Rayyi alang Calasiv. Nniqan gasuc Ga mniq nsgan ruwan ksska mpitu alang ka alang Calasiv, hunac o lutuc alang Wenre, lutuc alang Rayyi ka hraan hidaw, kssiyaw alang Yirin ka daya hraan hidaw, lutuc alang Kuro ka gqiyan hidaw. Pgkla patas cyawtung Ppanun rulu:Kndadax sngyan rulu qrngul ppanan basu Pingtung quri Rayyi, dhuq do priyux haya musa alang. Quri Pingtung:Tay yi syen Nsgan Sinpi, quri saw Syangtan, lutuc dgiyaq kungru kika dhuq da. Quri Kawcyung:Nanerkaw Tucing Nancwo cyawryodaw. Sjiqan klgan nealang Seejiq Paywan. Djiyun kari Kari Paywan ni kari tlug. Snhiyun cungcyaw Tyencucyaw. Pnaah alang Minkwo 42 hngkawas kndadax Carasywo , Cyaraafus tnhjil hini ni pnhyugan kingal alang. Kika balay bi alang Paywan. Mniq gqiyan hidaw ssiyaw yayung mdudul gggiyaq, lutuc hunac alang Wenre, lutuc gqiyan hidaw alang Kuro, daya hraan hidaw ni ssiyaw alang Yirin.
